channel.title: Upload for a Webclient
channel.description:
Hey everyone how do you do today,
basically I run a runescape market forum and everyone wants a Private Server. I got 2 guys coding one for me and 1 guy doing the graphics. I've made a sub-domain for the webclient and the folder for everything.
What I don't understand now is how do I upload everything to get it to work. How do I set-up the VPS.
Just to break it down and make sure everyone understands. -I have a client + soruce. -I have a website + hosting + VPS
What do I do now. I'd really appreciate it if someone can give me a set by set or a rough overview. I'm a good website coder so I'll understand the basics but other then that I'd like some help on.
If I'm aloud here is where the webclient should be: www.webclient.varrockcity.org
^^Sorry if that isn't aloud PM me or admin remove it.
Thank you for reading.

item.title: Upload for a Webclient
item.dc:creator: @ander123 ander123
item.description:
@ander123 wrote:

Hey everyone how do you do today,

basically I run a runescape market forum and everyone wants a Private Server.
I got 2 guys coding one for me and 1 guy doing the graphics.
I’ve made a sub-domain for the webclient and the folder for everything.
